title: A Robust Permutation Test for Subvector Inference in Linear Regressions. (arXiv:2205.06713v3 [econ.EM] UPDATED)
abstract: We develop a new permutation test for inference on a subvector of coefficients in linear models. The test is exact when the regressors and the error terms are independent. Then, we show that the test is asymptotically of correct level, consistent and has power against local alternatives when the independence condition is relaxed, under two main conditions. The first is a slight reinforcement of the usual absence of correlation between the regressors and the error term. The second is that the number of strata, defined by values of the regressors not involved in the subvector test, is small compared to the sample size. The latter implies that the vector of nuisance regressors is discrete. Simulations and empirical illustrations suggest that the test has good power in practice if, indeed, the number of strata is small compared to the sample size.

translated_title: 一种线性回归子向量推断的稳健置换检验方法
translated_abstract: 我们开发了一种新的置换检验方法，用于线性模型中系数的子向量推断。当自变量和误差项独立时，该检验方法是精确的。接着，我们证明在两个主要条件下，当独立条件得到放松时，该检验方法在渐进意义下具有正确的水平、一致性和对局部替代方法的功率。第一个条件是通常的自变量和误差项之间缺乏相关性的略微强化。第二个条件是，由不涉及子向量检验的自变量值定义的分层数目相对于样本量很小。这意味着干扰自变量向量是离散的。模拟和实证说明，如果的确有少量的分层相对于样本量而言，该检验方法在实践中具有良好的功效。
tldr: 本文提出了一种针对线性回归模型中系数子向量推断的新置换检验方法，该方法具有精确性和稳健性，在特定条件下具有正确的水平、一致性和对局部替代方法的功率。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes a new permutation test for subvector inference in linear regressions, which is exact when the regressors and the error terms are independent and is asymptotically of correct level, consistent and has power against local alternatives when the independence condition is relaxed, under two main conditions. The method is shown to be effective in practice if there are only a few strata coimpared to the sample size.
